Text.Page:
This list never seems to get any shorter. Here, let me just give you a whole group—it will make me feel like I'm making some progress.

Here we are—go hunt down {@LinkCreature:38#1#sentinel officers}, {@LinkCreature:38#2#lurking rockcrawlers}, {@LinkCreature:38#44#ruinswalker demons}, {@LinkCreature:38#15#arbosk enchanters}, {@LinkCreature:38#16#deskera imps}, and {@LinkCreature:38#30#ruins hyenas}.

That should keep you busy.

Report in with Deiana at the Roostcliff Quarter in Sienna Canyon when you've finished.

Good job. Here's your reward.

Keep up the good work!
